sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; const ScrollButton = ({ click, filter, href, id, path, scrolling, title }) => { return ( { title } ); }; ScrollButton.propTypes = { filter: PropTypes.string, href: PropTypes.string, id: PropTypes.string, path: PropTypes.string, title: PropTypes.string, }; export default ScrollButton;
